text: The 1980 Welsh Cup Final was the final of the 93rd season of the main domestic football cup competition in Wales, the Welsh Cup. The final was contested between Newport County and Shrewsbury Town over two legs. Newport County won 5–1 on aggregate, winning both legs. ==Route to the final== ===Newport County=== Newport County scores are shown first in every match {| class="wikitable"
